name: createVoucherEntryUsingSustainabilityAccounts

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to Voucher Entry page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Voucher Entry}

testSteps.description: Then the Payment Information form and its contents should show up
When I set the Supplier to '133339'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Supplier']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Supplier')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

testSteps.description: When I set the 'Invoice Number' to '1wKJTkUbCs'
When I set the Currency to 'USD'
When i click on continue button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the Gross Amount to '10000'
When I set the Payment Terms to '30'
When I set the Tax Area to 'KF7'
Then the tax amount of the first line should be filled out
When i click on continue button
Then the 'GL Distribution' form and its contents should show up
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '960001', Line Description: 'TEST1', Amount: '1000', Cost Center: 'DAV2000', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAIG', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1', Units: '21'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '960002', Line Description: 'TEST1', Amount: '1000', Cost Center: 'DAV2120', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAIG', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1', Units: '10'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '960003', Line Description: 'TEST1', Amount: '1000', Cost Center: 'AMM2100', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAIG', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1', Units: '30'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '960004', Line Description: 'TEST1', Amount: '1000', Cost Center: 'DAM1000', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAIG', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1', Units: '40'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '948001', Line Description: 'TEST1', Amount: '<null>', Cost Center: 'AMM2110', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAIG', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test1', Units: '1'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the voucher entry successfully created modal and its contents should show up
